intro: Palala sphaerula, commonly known as the globe lily, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its unique spherical flower head, which consists of numerous small, white, bell-shaped flowers. The plant belongs to the Amaryllidaceae family and is known for its striking appearance and ornamental value. It typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Palala sphaerula is often cultivated in gardens for its beauty and resilience.
